definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Antibiotic use is half of the drug-resistance equation, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，抗生素的应用占耐药性原因的一半。

sentences.english: The results of drug-fast showed that tolerance of Streptococcus faecium was higher than that of Streptococcus faecalis.
sentences.chinese: 药敏结果显示屎肠球菌的耐药性高于粪肠球菌。

sentences.english: Which adds to the growing problem of antibiotic resistance.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法加剧了日益严峻的抗菌素耐药性问题。

sentences.english: Attention should be paid to drug resistance and dependence in the discharge medication of tuberculosis patients.
sentences.chinese: 对结核病患者出院带药应该注意耐药性和患者依从性。

sentences.english: Conclusions There was cross-resistance of flouroquinolone agents.
sentences.chinese: 结论氟喹诺酮类抗菌药物存在交叉耐药性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the distribution of airborne drug-resistance bacteria with various resistance.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查空气中不同耐药性的耐药菌的分布情况。

sentences.english: No resistance to tenofovir or entecavir was observed in the study.
sentences.chinese: 没有替诺福韦或恩替卡韦的耐药性研究中观察到。

sentences.english: This improves cure rates and reduces risks of drug resistance development.
sentences.chinese: 这提高了治愈率，降低了耐药性加剧的风险。

sentences.english: Objective In order to study the resistance of Shigellae flexneri to norfloxacin as well as its mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究福氏志贺菌对诺氟沙星的耐药性及耐药机制。

sentences.english: Conclusion The bacterial resistance to AMB and ICZ is rising gradually.
sentences.chinese: 结论烟曲霉菌对AMB和ICZ的耐药性不断升高。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mechanisms of resistance plasmid in Klebsiella pneumoniae.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨耐药性质粒在肺炎克雷伯杆菌中的耐药机制。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the serotypes and resistance of Shigellae in epidemic season.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查志贺菌在流行季节的主要血清型和耐药性。

sentences.english: The combined therapy approach apparently reduces tumor resistance to chemotherapy, they say.
sentences.chinese: 联合疗法可明显降低肿瘤细胞对化疗的耐药性。

sentences.english: Lamivudine-resistant mutations were detected in both patients.
sentences.chinese: 在两名病人中均检测到拉米夫定耐药性。

sentences.english: Most older antimalarials have been rendered useless by drug resistance.
sentences.chinese: 耐药性已使多数较陈旧的抗疟药物失去效用。

sentences.english: As a result, the broad-spectrum antibiosis and no drug resistance of TCM has the extraordinary advantage.
sentences.chinese: 中药的广谱抗菌性及无耐药性的优势明显。
